Package org.geotoolkit.io

Class LEDataOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.FilterOutputStream
org.geotoolkit.io.LEDataOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class LEDataOutputStream extends FilterOutputStream implements DataOutput
Little endian Data output stream.
Author:
Johann Sorel (Geomatys)

    • realign

      public void realign​(int padding) throws IOException
      Align byte stream to a padding value, 0 bytes will be added until padding value is reached. Padding values are usually very small, 2, 4 or 8 bytes to ensure primitive types such as Short, Integer, Float are aligned in memory.
      Parameters:
      padding - value to realign.
      Throws:
      IOException
